Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.decks.cards

Class SpecialObjectiveCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.decks.cards.ObjectiveCard
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.decks.cards.SpecialObjectiveCard
public class SpecialObjectiveCard extends ObjectiveCard
Represents a special object objective card. It specifies which and how many special objects the player needs to have in his play area.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialObjectiveCard

      public SpecialObjectiveCard(int cardPoints, SpecialObject[] objective, int id)
      Constructs a SpecialObjectiveCard with specified points and objective.
      Parameters:
      cardPoints - specifies the points awarded to the player upon accomplishing its objective.
      objective - specifies which and how many special objects the player needs to have in his play area.
